sourcesContent:
import {useSignIn} from "react-auth-kit"; import axios from "axios"; function Login(props: any) { const signIn = useSignIn(); const submit = async (values: any) => { values.preventDefault() console.log(values) const post = await axios.post('/api/user/login', values) console.log(post) signIn({ token: post.token, expiresIn: 3600, tokenType: 'Bearer', authState: {username: values.username} }) } return <>

Login



} export default Login;
